languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, предаваясь воспоминаниям, но все еще продолжает наблюдать за вами.{/n} "Должна заметить, элантах, во время медитации разум не покидает тела — и часть его остается бдеть и следить за происходящим вовне. Так что я слышала каждое твое слово. И видела все, что ты делаешь".

{n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза, предаваясь воспоминаниям, но все еще продолжает наблюдать за вами.{/n} "Должна заметить, элантах, во время медитации разум не покидает тела — и часть его остается бдеть и следить за происходящим вовне. Так что я слышала каждое твое слово. И видела все, что ты делаешь".

So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos, evocando sus recuerdos sin quitarte la vista de encima.{/n} «Debo aclarar, elantach, que la mente no abandona el cuerpo durante la meditación; parte de ella continúa alerta, vigilando lo que ocurre a su alrededor. Por eso he oído cada palabra que has pronunciado. Y he visto todo lo que has hecho».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet entorna los ojos, evocando sus recuerdos sin quitarte la vista de encima.{/n} «Debo aclarar, elantach, que la mente no abandona el cuerpo durante la meditación; parte de ella continúa alerta, vigilando lo que ocurre a su alrededor. Por eso he oído cada palabra que has pronunciado. Y he visto todo lo que has hecho».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じ、思い出に身をゆだねながら、まだこちらを見ている。{/n}「エランタ、瞑想中の精神は身体から離れるわけではない。心の一部は目を覚ましたまま、周囲の状況を警戒している。だから、お前が発した言葉もすべて聞いていた。お前が何をしていたかもすべて知っている」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは目を半分閉じ、思い出に身をゆだねながら、まだこちらを見ている。{/n}「エランタ、瞑想中の精神は身体から離れるわけではない。心の一部は目を覚ましたまま、周囲の状況を警戒している。だから、お前が発した言葉もすべて聞いていた。お前が何をしていたかもすべて知っている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛，一边观察着你，一边沉浸在回忆中。{/n}“外界人，我得说明一下。在冥想的过程中，我的心灵并没有脱离身体，我仍有一部分心智仍保持警惕，留意着外界发生的动静。因此，你说的每个字我都听到了，你做的每个举动我也都看到了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特半闭着眼睛，一边观察着你，一边沉浸在回忆中。{/n}“外界人，我得说明一下。在冥想的过程中，我的心灵并没有脱离身体，我仍有一部分心智仍保持警惕，留意着外界发生的动静。因此，你说的每个字我都听到了，你做的每个举动我也都看到了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ferme à demi les yeux et se laisse envahir par des souvenirs tout en continuant à vous regarder.{/n} « Sachez, elantach, que mon esprit ne quitte pas mon corps lorsque je médite. Il conserve une partie de sa vigilance aux événements extérieurs. J'ai donc entendu tout ce que vous avez dit et vu tout ce que vous avez fait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ferme à demi les yeux et se laisse envahir par des souvenirs tout en continuant à vous regarder.{/n} « Sachez, elantach, que mon esprit ne quitte pas mon corps lorsque je médite. Il conserve une partie de sa vigilance aux événements extérieurs. J'ai donc entendu tout ce que vous avez dit et vu tout ce que vous avez fait. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lässt ihre Augen halb zufallen und gibt sich Erinnerungen hin, während sie dich weiterhin beobachtet.{/n} "Ich sollte sagen, Elantach, dass der Verstand den Körper während der Meditation nicht verlässt. Ein Teil bleibt wachsam und beobachtet, was außen geschieht. Ich habe daher jedes Eurer Worte gehört. Und ich habe alles gesehen, was Ihr getan habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lässt ihre Augen halb zufallen und gibt sich Erinnerungen hin, während sie dich weiterhin beobachtet.{/n} "Ich sollte sagen, Elantach, dass der Verstand den Körper während der Meditation nicht verlässt. Ein Teil bleibt wachsam und beobachtet, was außen geschieht. Ich habe daher jedes Eurer Worte gehört. Und ich habe alles gesehen, was Ihr getan habt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kapatarak kendini hatıralara kaptırıyor. Gelgelelim bir yandan hâlâ seni izliyor.{/n} "Elantach, şunu belirtmem gerekir ki meditasyon esnasında zihin bedenden ayrılmaz. Bir kısmı her daim tetiktedir, dışarıda olan bitenleri gözlemler. Yani ağzından çıkan her bir sözü işitip yaptığın her şeyi gördüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet lets her eyes fall half-closed, giving herself over to memories while still watching you.{/n} "I should say, elantach, that during meditation, the mind does not leave the body — part of it remains vigilant, monitoring what is taking place outside. So I heard every word you said. And I saw everything you did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, gözlerini hafif kapatarak kendini hatıralara kaptırıyor. Bir yandan hâlâ seni izliyor.{/n} "Elantach, şunu belirtmem gerekir ki meditasyon esnasında zihin bedenden ayrılmaz. Bir kısmı her daim tetiktedir, dışarıda olan bitenleri gözlemler. Yani ağzından çıkan her bir sözü işitip yaptığın her şeyi gördüm."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
